MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL15 and LL21 postcode areas of Ruthin and Corwen, affecting properties in Derwen and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.44PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.22PM on 6th November 2020.
